item.description:
Hello Friends,

BPO cordially invites you to yet another exclusive & stylish Bollywood Night at the OM Restaurant / Lounge on Fri, May 4th. OM is Cambridgeâ€™s Sexiest Upscale Lounge situated at Harvard Square. We promise another unforgettable night so come and get crazy as DJ Arun will be spinning the latest in Bollywood, Bhangra, Top40, Hip-Hop, and the classics you all love; you'll be dancing all night!

Limited tickets available now at: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=GTQ6TD78Y99HN

More about BPO: https://www.facebook.com/groups/bporg/

Dress Code: No shorts/hats/t-shirts/sneakers. Dress to impress.


Bringing a big group of friends?
Interested in becoming a promoter?
Contact us to get group discounts or details on how to be our exclusive promoter.

Hope to see you all at OM!

Best,

BPO
item.name: Bollywood Night
